typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesQuotaKey as integer,
		EmployeeKey as integer,
		DateKey as integer,
		CalendarYear as integer,
		CalendarQuarter as integer,
		SalesAmountQuota as decimal(19,4),
		Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(CalendarYear),
	SalesAmountQuota = sum(),
		SalesAmountQuota = count()) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sink1
